DOC.brief_title: Single Ascending Dose Study With Healthy Male Volunteers Type II Diabetic Patients
DOC.criteria: Part A , Healthy male subject , age ≥20 ≤40 year . Part B , Male T2DM patient , age ≥20 ≤65 year . Treatment metformin single therapy T2DM least 30 day prior enrollment Part A , Clin sign illness clin relevant trauma , judge investigator , within 2 week first administration IP . Part A Clin sign abnormality clinical chemistry , haematology , urinalysis result judge investigator Part B , History ischemic heart disease , symptomatic heart failure , stroke , transitory ischemic attack symptomatic peripheral vascular disease .
